title: Anyone else getting disgusting lag spikes?
body:
I've been noticing I've been getting extreme lag spikes in my games at seemingly random times. I've not seen myself get to 2k ping in a looooooong time. Anyone else having the same issue? I've checked my router and internet connection and everything seems fine but for some reason, I'm just getting crapped on by my connection. 

Here's a reference from right after I finished my Poro King game where I was bouncing from anywhere between 200 - 700 ping. 
http://beta.speedtest.net/result/6877722712.png

replies.body:
Try doing a ping test to sydney.

Also it can be a few things depending on what is occuring.

It could be packet loss, it could be ping, it could be ISP based as well.

Looking here (assuming it works because it wasn't working for me) will help you determine what the issue might be;

https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/

is it weird i have a more stable internet connection playing from Ho Chi Minh, than I ever did in Adelaide? Yesterday i had 300ms (internet to everything else was fine, Overwatch was running at a pleasant 22ms), today in an entirely different country, I have 180ms to oceania server, and my cousin has 30ms on his local server. Go figure.

Getting the same problem we recently got nbn so it might be ISP issue with league server. We get ping spikes 75-100ms at night. Did a trace route to google server and ping was stable (10-15ms) but a traceroute to league servers are timing out...
Overwatch is fine we are consistently getting 15-25ms. Like JasonWazza said it could be ISP based.

Same issue, since 7.23 patch, my internet is normally aids, but within 200 ping aids if in use by more than just me, normally i sit at 45 when there is nothing in use other than league, but have been hitting 1.2-7k  Ping at least 1 in 3 games with no reasoning, no idea how to fix it
